name: Full Moon Flavors
description:
You match with Luna on Tinderwolf! Amazing! Your werewolf dating adventure is starting! Let's see if you can get her to come over for a curry.

Be sure to take create it the way she likes - she can be very picky with ingredients!

Make sure to make it the way she likes.

Game by Nina Toby, Sofia and Bo at the Nordic Game Jam 2023.
